name: RedLightGreenLightYellowLight
0:
”Alexa, open red light green light yellow light”
”Alexa, begin red light green light yellow light”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: red light green light yellow light
des:
This skill modernizes the game of Red Light Green Light with Alexa and Echo Buttons. 
To begin you will need to trigger 1 echo button for this skill, then place the echo buttons at the finish line and have your players at the start line. When you are ready just say, 'Lets Start'. The first person to press the echo button at the finish line wins!
(please note that because Echo Buttons communicate with Alexa via Bluetooth the Echo Buttons work best within 15 feet (4.5 meters) of your Alexa device.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
